sentences.en: Financial plutocracy must give way to financial democracy – banking as if people mattered.
sentences.cn: 金融富豪必须让位于金融民主-人民做主的金融。

sentences.en: If only millionaires can afford to run for office, we shall quickly become a plutocracy.
sentences.cn: 如果只有大富豪才负担得起公职的竞选, 我们将很快变成富豪政治.

sentences.en: The most prolific of the debunkers of the plutocracy was Gustavus Myers.
sentences.cn: 揭发富豪统治集团的作家中,最多产的是古斯塔夫斯·迈尔斯.

words.tran_cn: 富豪的；财阀的；有钱有势的

trans.tran_cn: 富豪统治，财阀统治，富豪[财阀]统治集团，富豪，财阀
trans.tran_en: a ruling class or government that consists of rich people, or a country that is governed by rich people
